title: Phyllis Schlavi said: " There will be a woman president on my dead body? '
subtitle: The late Felice Shalavay, an open and anti-women's province, said many controversial things in her life, but not that there was a female head on her body.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Phyllis Schlaev once said, "There's gonna be a woman president on my body."
